item.title: Keyboard layouts across languages: A Text input analysis
item.description: Proposal Digital language death is a real issue for many small and under-resourced languages. To use Kornaiâ€™s (2013) terms, the digital moribund state of languages is accelerated by the lack of intuitive and useful text input methods for many minority and under-resourced languages. Even if text input methods currently exist for a language, it is often the case that they are disruptive (rather than smooth) to the digital text production process, due to inadequately optimized keyboards.
